medical_history.chief_complaint: Isolated 46,XY Gonadal Dysgenesis in two sisters.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Sister 1 was born in 1981 and presented with amenorrhea at 15 years of age. She was at Tanner stage B4. Sister 2, born in 1986, was prepubertal when she presented at age 10 years and 10 months with low hormone levels and no virilization of external genitalia.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Both sisters have a 46,XY karyotype. Sister 1 underwent gonadectomy, revealing streak gonads with a gonadoblastoma, while Sister 2's gonadectomy revealed streak gonads with gonadoblastoma bilaterally.
medical_history.family_history: The healthy mother of both sisters is a carrier of the duplication identified.
medical_history.social_history: The sisters moved to Sweden in 1988 and have normal psychomotor development, having both studied at the university level.
